SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.effects

Interface Effect

All Known Implementing Classes:
KnockbackEffect, PoisonEffect, StunEffect
public interface Effect
Interface for effects that can be applied to an entity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    apply(Entity target)
    Applies the effect to the target entity.
    float
    getDuration()
    Returns the duration of the effect.
    EffectType
    getType()
    Returns the type of the effect.
    boolean
    isExpired()
    Checks if the effect has expired.
    void
    refresh(Effect newEffect)
    Refreshes the effect's state based on a new effect instance.
    void
    remove(Entity target)
    Removes the effect from the target entity.
    void
    update(Entity target, float deltaTime)
    Updates the effect's state.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      void apply(Entity target)
      Applies the effect to the target entity.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity to apply the effect to.

    • update

      void update(Entity target, float deltaTime)
      Updates the effect's state.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity the effect is applied to.
      deltaTime - The time elapsed since the last update.

    • remove

      void remove(Entity target)
      Removes the effect from the target entity.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity to remove the effect from.

    • refresh

      void refresh(Effect newEffect)
      Refreshes the effect's state based on a new effect instance.
      Parameters:
      newEffect - The new effect instance to refresh with.

    • isExpired

      boolean isExpired()
      Checks if the effect has expired.
      Returns:
      True if the effect has expired, false otherwise.

    • getType

      EffectType getType()
      Returns the type of the effect.
      Returns:
      EffectType enum.

    • getDuration

      float getDuration()
      Returns the duration of the effect.
      Returns:
      Seconds as a float.
